channel.title: Need help with changing server IP's AND PORTS!
channel.description: Hey guys/girls i need some help with my v2 client. I do not have a change server option on the login or in a tab. the only way is to change the client.java setting which is a pain. Could some 1 please tell me how to make a change server(AND PORT PLZ) tab or in the login box?

item.title: Need help with changing server IP's AND PORTS!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“ryry871, post:5, topic:293388”][quote author=Kuchiki link=topic=388228.msg2902431#msg2902431 date=1249603814]
Making a change server/port box would be more annoying.

Look in client.java and EGui.java (if you have it) for “setserver” and server" And for the port…Search client.java for “port” and insert your port/ip inbetween the “”.
[/quote]Well i want to make the tab/login box have it because i will be posting it for download (hopefully soon) and i want to mod it up a little and make it easier to use[/quote]

Well, there are tuts on this on r-s I believe. I cannot remember entirely from memory…But, I do know from experience most people don’t like IP changers. ;]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with changing server IP's AND PORTS!
